title: All i want for Christmas
body: Dear Riot All i want for Christmas is an Astronaut Sona skin, make it happen plz

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZEdkWAGB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-24T21:57:46.510+0000)
>
> I want my Traditional Karma.

tfw when Karma main and it was the first mystery gift I ever got, and the only skin I have ever reeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaally wanted. They should have never changed her skin in the rework though.

Old Karma was rather oppressive, I played her a little back before her rework. (I should actually have her Traditional Skin, don't know why I don't)
The skin/model change makes a lot of sense if you ever played Old Karma.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZEdkWAGB,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-24T22:21:47.155+0000)

> Old Karma was rather oppressive, I played her a little back before her rework. (I should actually have her Traditional Skin, don't know why I don't)
> The skin/model change makes a lot of sense if you ever played Old Karma.

I never played the old Karma. I joined the game after it was done, and started playing Karma as she is when I was like level 13. I miss how I would get triple kills when double ganked by new players...
What was it like though? Were the animations really clunky and stuff? I know she used to use her fans and in her new animations she doesn't.
Old Karma would start a fight on less than half health and by the time it was done she would have healed to full and burst down the entire enemy team by herself.
